General.Name: Uwc Bhd
General.Description: UWC Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of precision sheet metal fabrication, precision machined components, and value-added assembly services in Malaysia, the United States, Singapore, India, France, Netherlands, China, and internationally. The company also engages in engineering, designing, manufacturing, and assembling of automation solutions; and contract manufacturing of automated test equipment. In addition, it provides laser, combo laser punching, bending, welding, computer numerical controlled milling and turning, painting, and silk screen, as well as assembly services, which include sub-module, electro-mechanical, and full turnkey assembly. Further, the company provides precision machined components and finishing treatment solutions. It primarily serves semiconductor, life science and medical technology, heavy duty, and other industries. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Penang, Malaysia. UWC Berhad is a subsidiary of UWC Capital Sdn. Bhd.
